name: Annihilation
victoryScreenHeader: Build Project Sundial, Project Fractal, and Project Hyphae to ensure the extinction of the human race.
victoryString: Humanity is doomed to extinction. Hope for survival has long left the human race. Are you satisfied now?
defeatString: Human civilization has reached its end. Any onlookers look at us with immense pity. There is no more hope to cling on to.
